$AAPL Apple envisions putting all your health information in the palm of your hand. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-wants-to-bring-medical-records-to-all/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Wants To Bring Medical Records To All iPhone Users
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has always had big ambitions in the healthcare space, but we're only now finally starting to see those plans come to fruition. As CNBC reports, the tech titan could soon allow iPhone users to access important health info right on their smartphones: Apple wants to bring consumers' medical information, like lab tests and immunizations, to its iPhone, and now 40 health systems have agreed to step up and help.

links.title: Rolling Stocks: Apple Inc., (NASDAQ: AAPL)
links.description: U.S. fund investors drained another $14 billion from the stock market during the most recent week, Lipper data showed on Thursday. The withdrawals during the week ended March 28 are the largest since early February's market meltdown, according to the research service.Source Reuter Snapshot: On Thursday, Shares of Apple Inc., (NASDAQ: AAPL), performed 0.78 percent and closed at $167.78 in the last trading session.

messages.body: Value in the age of digital networks... a work in progress: https://www.technologyreview.com/s/610614/how-network-theory-predicts-the-value-of-bitcoin/ $BTC.X $ETH.X $AMZN $GOOG $FB $AAPL etc etc etc

links.title: How network theory predicts the value of Bitcoin
links.description: Philosophers, economists, and theorists have various ways to judge how money should be valued. Some have said that its worth lies in a high cost of production. Others see it as simply a form of credit that allows the transfer of resources, which is why it can take the form of pieces of paper or even digital records.

message.body: RBC Bullish On Spotify Ahead Of IPO, Sets $220 Price Target https://benzinga.com/z/11439952 $SPOT $AAPL $NFLX

links.title: RBC Bullish On Spotify (NYSE:SPOT) Ahead Of IPO, Sets $220 Price Target
links.description: Wall Street isn't waiting for Spotify Technology (NYSE: SPOT)'s planned April 3 IPO to weigh in on the stock. RBC Capital Markets analyst Mark Mahaney has initiated coverage of Spotify with an Outperform rating and $220 price target. Spotify stock has roughly 70-percent upside from its recent $127.50 private transaction price, Mahaney said in a Thursday note.

links.title: Apple Releases watchOS 4.3 with iPhone Music Controls, Portrait Nightstand Mode, and More
links.description: Following iOS 11.3, Apple also released watchOS 4.3 to the public today. The updated Apple Watch software, first released as a developer beta in January, brings a variety of improvements for music playback, a smarter Siri watch face, and bug fixes. In watchOS 4.3, Apple has restored the ability to browse the entire iPhone music [...]

links.title: 5 factors causing the tech sector slump - Investments Revolution
links.description: The technology sector's recent slump may not be over. Regulatory concerns and ongoing fears of protectionism continue to weigh on the sector. A sell-off in technology stocks put pressure on global stocks this week - and the sector's recent slump may not be over.

links.title: April is usually good for stocks, but it comes at a dicey time
links.description: April is usually a good month for stocks, but there are plenty of reasons why it could be cruel this year. As markets leave behind the volatile months of February and March, worries that helped drive stocks lower continue to hang over April.
